Class GeometricObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeometricObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GeometricObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComparableCircle, ComparableRectangle, ComparableTriangle

    public abstract class GeometricObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GeometricObject>
    The following class is used to provide implementation for variables and methods for any geometric object class that is a subclass of this one, as well as provide abstract methods for those subclasses to implement on their own.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected GeometricObject()
      Construct a default geometric object
      protected GeometricObject(java.lang.String color, boolean filled)
      Construct a geometric object with color and filled value
